actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army to expedite accomplishment of urban flood control and flood plain management plans.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army to expedite accomplishment of urban flood control and flood plain management plans by establishing firm plans to solve flood control problems.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army to expedite accomplishment of urban flood control and flood plain management plans.
